Determination of mean fm and error for Seawater standard rec num 127299.

Data pulled from no_os by rec_num.

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
#Load Libraries
library(amstools)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(knitr)

digits=4

#set parameters- from, to, sys not used if loading from file
from <- '2014-09-01'
to <- 'present' #present or date
sys <- 'both' #cfams, usams, ams1 or both

#Pull the data
ss <- getStandards(from, to, sys, rec = 127298)
```

Here's the data...

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
qplot(f_modern, data=ss)

kable(select(ss, tp_num, tp_date_pressed, wheel, gf_co2_qty, f_modern, f_int_error, f_ext_error))
```

Not sure what that low fm value is, but let's cut it.

```{r}
ss <- filter(ss, f_modern > .92)
```

That leaves us with N = `r nrow(ss)`, mean = `r mean(ss$f_modern)`, sd = `r sd(ss$f_modern)`.
